name: togethercomputer/RedPajama-Data-1T
description: Together Computer's RedPajama dataset is a significant contribution to the AI community. As a clean-room, open-source implementation of the LLaMa dataset, it provides a reliable and transparent foundation for machine learning research. This dataset is designed to promote reproducibility and collaboration among researchers, making it an essential tool for advancing AI technology.
citeAs: @software{together2023redpajama,   author = {Together Computer},   title = {RedPajama: An Open Source Recipe to Reproduce LLaMA training dataset},   month = April,   year = 2023,   url = {https://github.com/togethercomputer/RedPajama-Data} }
creator: togethercomputer
